full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, RANG DANG SKAL PA MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA 'BYUNG NGAM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS ^BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA, NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA CHAGS SO BZOD PAR GSOL LO, ,CUNG ZAD DGE BAS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
